summary: THE VSC TRAC LIGHT AND ENGINE LIGHT OF MY 2005 TOYOTA SEQUOIA IS ON.  WHEN DRIVING THE ENGINE SEEMS TO HESITATE AND LURCHES FORWARD.  I WAS TOLD THAT I WILL HAVE TO REPLACE MY TRANSMISSION.  MY CAR ONLY HAS 45,000 MILES ON IT AND OUR WARRANTY EXPIRED ONE MONTH AGO.  MY INTERNET RESEARCH SHOWS THAT THIS IS A VERY COMMON PROBLEM.  A NEW TRANSMISSION WILL COST THOUSANDS OF DOLLARS AND IS UN-ACCEPTABLE FOR SUCH A YOUNG CAR. *TR
